attributes.action: Get Parliament to talk about immigration and fix it!
attributes.additional_details:
We want to ask if Immigrants to this country(UK)have their rights upheld.
We need parliament to talk about the issue on hand. We need to put an end to this debate.
Immigrants are humans and are equal to the rest of us they needed to be treated with their human rights.
We should put forward Article 13,14 and 15 of the Universal declaration of human rights.
